author: darrell sivik
comment: @Calligraphy Girl I forgive you. It's not your fault, your not a terrible person. You were trying to help me. And I thank you for your help. I'm trying my best. I just got back from surgery on my toe (it was painful) but I'm okay now

author: Calligraphy Girl
comment: @darrell sivik omg I'm such a terrible person ğŸ˜¢ ğŸ˜– I didn't mean to loose your connection with Moka... Please tell her I said all of the stuff I have to told you to do... I'm at the hospital right now(I passed out on Friday night, my body felt stiff and weak ;-; I don't think the chemo is working..) I have never felt so bad... I'm truly am sorry. Please forgive me.

author: darrell sivik
comment: @Calligraphy Girl I talked to Moka about it. She looked at me with anger and fear, I think she thought I was gonna give her away, I dont want to tho. But I dont want to look like the bad person. But Moka doesnt trust me now, like when I told her that she... she reared up and I fell off of her, she is 2 feet taller than me. I am 5 foot something. And when I fell I twisted my ankle, that's why I didnt go to school today. I think I lost my connection with her... idk what to do. I miss my old Moka... If I try talking to her she would just turn around and give me the Talk to the rump sign. Good thing Storm has been a good boy and has been making me feel better. Moka and Storm havent been getting along since. This was yesterday.

author: Calligraphy Girl
comment: @darrell sivik 2 years ago wow... Well If the original owner wants Moka back then let them find you, and make an arrangement (like have them visit with her every once in a while or if they live far away then do a video chat with you, Moka and the owner) and talk to Moka about this and see if she agrees about the arrangement. I hope this helps ğŸ˜Š

author: darrell sivik
comment: @Calligraphy Girl no you didnt, I read it out loud to Moka and she looked at me made a sad neigh. She feels bad for you, I can tell because she looked at me and nudged me and neigh with sadness. When I found her she had pictures of her and her mother.her mother only had 3 legs, and I found a letter that said this: Dear Suzy, that foal you wanted was taken away by thieves 2 months ago. And her mother died last month from loosing her baby. Dont be mad, I still love you. I will get that foal back and make sure that the person or people who took her will pay! Bye Suzy. From: Your brother That's what it said, so that was 2 years ago. Moka was supposed to be someone else's horse... And when she was taken it happened to her agian 2 years later. So I guess her owner did want her to sell to his sister. It feels like I took Moka. What should I do? That was 2 years ago.

author: akira wolfe
comment: wow, this is a really good amv! the old Japanese-like rhythm in the beginning and the constant background of dark blue, creating a nightly stroll in an old Japanese movie atmosphere and the way it becomes lighter as the music changes into something more modern. And I really like the slow but fast-paced feel from this video, it's not really overwhelming but enrapturing at the same time, making a good balance.  overall, excellent work and I hope to see something as brilliant as this in the future!
